name: External Credit Risk Score
descr: The score provided by external credit bureaus reflecting the creditworthiness of an individual.

name: Months Since Oldest Credit Line
descr: The number of months since the individual's oldest credit line was opened.

name: Months Since Latest Credit Line Opened
descr: The time elapsed since the most recent credit line was initiated.

name: Average Age of Credit Lines (Months)
descr: The average number of months that all the individual's credit lines have been open.

name: Number of Satisfactory Credit Lines
descr: The count of credit lines where payments have been made on time and are in good standing.

name: Credit Lines with 60+ Days Late Payment or Public Records
descr: The number of credit lines that have payments late by 60 days or more, or that have negative public records.

name: Credit Lines with 90+ Days Late Payment or Public Records
descr: The number of credit lines that have payments late by 90 days or more, or that have negative public records.

name: Percentage of Credit Lines Never Delinquent
descr: The percentage of the individual's credit lines that have never been delinquent.

name: Months Since Most Recent Delinquency
descr: The number of months since the individual's last delinquent payment.

name: Worst Delinquency Status in Last 12 Months
descr: The most severe delinquency status recorded in the last 12 months.

name: Worst Delinquency Status Ever
descr: The most severe delinquency status the individual has ever had.

name: Total Number of Credit Lines
descr: The total count of all credit lines the individual has.

name: Number of Credit Lines Opened in Last 12 Months
descr: The count of new credit lines opened within the last 12 months.

name: Percentage of Installment-Based Credit Lines
descr: The percentage of the individual's credit lines that are installment-based (e.g., loans with fixed payment amounts).

name: Months Since Most Recent Credit Inquiry (excl. last 7 days)
descr: The number of months since the last credit inquiry, excluding the past week.

name: Number of Credit Inquiries in Last 6 Months
descr: The count of inquiries made into the individual's credit report in the past six months.

name: Number of Credit Inquiries in Last 6 Months (excl. last 7 days)
descr: The count of inquiries made into the individual's credit report in the past six months, excluding the last 7 days.

name: Used Fraction of Revolving Credit Lines
descr: The proportion of revolving credit that is currently being used by the individual.

name: Used Fraction of Installment Credit Lines
descr: The proportion of installment credit that is currently being used by the individual.

name: Number of Revolving Credit Lines with Outstanding Balance
descr: The count of revolving credit lines that have an outstanding balance.

name: Number of Installment Credit Lines with Outstanding Balance
descr: The count of installment credit lines that have an outstanding balance.

name: Bank/National Credit Lines with High Utilization
descr: The count of bank or national credit lines where a high proportion of the credit line is used.

name: Percentage of Credit Lines with Outstanding Balance
descr: The percentage of the individual's credit lines that have an outstanding balance.
